mapper.select:
SELECT ifnull(count(*),0) FROM doctor_pig_events
and type = 7 and rel_group_event_id is not null and barn_type in(5,6)

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
and `type` = 12 and barn_type = 7 and pig_status_before = 9 and pig_status_after = 9

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
and kind = 1 and type = 7

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
and kind = 1 and type = 20 and barn_type in (5,6)

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
and type = 6 and change_type_id = 110 and barn_type in (5,6)

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
and type = 6 and change_type_id = 111 and barn_type in (5,6)

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
and type = 6 and change_type_id = 109 and barn_type in (5,6)

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
and type = 2 and barn_type in (5,6)

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
AND `type` = 6 AND barn_type in (5,6) AND change_type_id not in( 109, 110, 111)

select ifnull(count(1),0) from doctor_pig_events
and `type` = 9 and kind = 1 and `doctor_mate_type` = 1 and `current_mating_count` = 1

select ifnull(count(1),0) from doctor_pig_events
and `type` = 9 and kind = 1 and `doctor_mate_type` in (2, 3) and `current_mating_count` = 1

select ifnull(count(1),0) from doctor_pig_events
and `type` = 9 and kind = 1 and `doctor_mate_type` = 4 and `current_mating_count` = 1

select ifnull(count(1),0) from doctor_pig_events
and `type` = 9 and kind = 1 and `doctor_mate_type` = 5 and `current_mating_count` = 1

select ifnull(count(1),0) from doctor_pig_events
and `type` = 9 and kind = 1 and `doctor_mate_type` = 6 and `current_mating_count` = 1

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
AND `type` = 9 AND current_mating_count = 1 AND barn_type in (5,6)

SELECT count(DISTINCT c.pig_id) AS ypzmzsl FROM doctor_pig_events c, ( SELECT a.pig_id AS pig_id, max(a.id) AS max_event_id FROM doctor_pig_events a, ( SELECT j.pig_id, max(j.event_at) AS max_event_at FROM doctor_pig_events j WHERE j.org_id=#{orgId} AND j.farm_id = #{farmId} and j.kind=1 and j.`status` = 1 AND j.event_at <= #{sumAt} GROUP BY j.pig_id ) t WHERE a.pig_id = t.pig_id AND a.event_at = t.max_event_at AND a.org_id = #{orgId} AND a.farm_id = #{farmId} AND a.event_at <= #{sumAt} GROUP BY a.pig_id ) max_events_temp WHERE max_events_temp.max_event_id = c.id AND c.type!=2 and c.type!=6 and c.type!=14 and (((type = 1 and barn_type!=7) or type = 12) or (type != 1 and type != 12 and (barn_type = 5 or barn_type = 6))) AND c.pig_status_after = 3

SELECT count(DISTINCT c.pig_id) AS khmzsl FROM doctor_pig_events c, ( SELECT a.pig_id AS pig_id, max(a.id) AS max_event_id FROM doctor_pig_events a, ( SELECT j.pig_id, max(j.event_at) AS max_event_at FROM doctor_pig_events j WHERE j.org_id=#{orgId} AND j.farm_id = #{farmId} and j.kind=1 and j.`status` = 1 AND j.event_at <= #{sumAt} GROUP BY j.pig_id ) t WHERE a.pig_id = t.pig_id AND a.event_at = t.max_event_at AND a.org_id = #{orgId} AND a.farm_id = #{farmId} AND a.event_at <= #{sumAt} GROUP BY a.pig_id ) max_events_temp WHERE max_events_temp.max_event_id = c.id AND c.type!=2 and c.type!=6 and c.type!=14 and (((type = 1 and barn_type!=7) or type = 12) or (type != 1 and type != 12 and (barn_type = 5 or barn_type = 6))) AND ( c.pig_status_after = 1 OR c.pig_status_after = 9 OR c.pig_status_after = 5 );

SELECT count(DISTINCT c.pig_id) AS hymzsl FROM doctor_pig_events c, ( SELECT a.pig_id AS pig_id, max(a.id) AS max_event_id FROM doctor_pig_events a, ( SELECT j.pig_id, max(j.event_at) AS max_event_at FROM doctor_pig_events j WHERE j.org_id=#{orgId} AND j.farm_id = #{farmId} and j.kind=1 and j.`status` = 1 AND j.event_at <= #{sumAt} GROUP BY j.pig_id ) t WHERE a.pig_id = t.pig_id AND a.event_at = t.max_event_at AND a.org_id = #{orgId} AND a.farm_id = #{farmId} AND a.event_at <= #{sumAt} GROUP BY a.pig_id ) max_events_temp WHERE max_events_temp.max_event_id = c.id AND c.type!=2 and c.type!=6 and c.type!=14 and (((type = 1 and barn_type!=7) or type = 12) or (type != 1 and type != 12 and (barn_type = 5 or barn_type = 6))) AND c.pig_status_after = 4

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
AND `type` = 11 AND preg_check_result = 1 AND barn_type in(5, 6)

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
AND `type` = 11 AND preg_check_result = 2 AND barn_type in(5, 6)

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
AND `type` = 11 AND preg_check_result = 4 AND barn_type in(5, 6)

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
AND `type` = 11 AND preg_check_result = 3 AND barn_type in(5, 6)

SELECT count(1) FROM doctor_pig_events a left join doctor_pig_events b on a.pig_id = b.pig_id
b.farm_id = #{farmId} and a.type = 16 and b.type = 9 and b.current_mating_count = 1 and datediff(b.event_at, a.event_at) <= 7 and a.event_at = #{sumAt} and a.parity + 1 = b.parity and a.status = 1 AND a.event_source != 5

SELECT count(1) FROM doctor_pig_events a left join doctor_pig_events b on a.pig_id = b.pig_id
b.farm_id = #{farmId} and a.type = 16 and b.type = 6 AND b.change_type_id in (110,111) and datediff(b.event_at, a.event_at) <= 7 and a.event_at = #{sumAt} and a.status = 1 and a.parity = b.parity AND a.event_source != 5

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
AND `type` = 14

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
and kind = 1 AND `type` = 20 AND barn_type = 7

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
and type = 6 and change_type_id = 110 and barn_type = 7

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
and type = 6 and change_type_id = 111 and barn_type = 7

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
and type = 6 and change_type_id = 109 and barn_type = 7

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
and type = 2 and barn_type = 7

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
AND `type` = 6 AND barn_type = 7 AND change_type_id not in( 109, 110, 111)

select count(*) FROM doctor_pig_events
farm_id = #{farmId} and `type` = 9 and current_mating_count = 1 and event_at = date_sub(#{sumAt}, INTERVAL 114 DAY ) and status = 1 AND event_source != 5

select count(1) FROM doctor_pig_events
farm_id = #{farmId} and `type` = 15 and event_at = date_add(#{sumAt}, INTERVAL 114 DAY ) and status = 1 AND event_source != 5

select ifnull(count(distinct b.id),0) from doctor_pig_events a left join doctor_pig_events b on a.pig_id = b.pig_id where a.farm_id =#{farmId} and a.type = 9 and a.`current_mating_count` = 1 and a.event_at = date_sub(#{sumAt}, INTERVAL 114 DAY) and b.type = 15 and a.`parity` = b.`parity` and a.status = 1 AND a.event_source != 5

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
AND `type` = 15

SELECT ifnull(sum(live_count), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
AND `type` = 15

SELECT ifnull(sum(health_count), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
AND `type` = 15

SELECT ifnull(sum(weak_count), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
AND `type` = 15

SELECT ifnull(sum(dead_count), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
AND `type` = 15

SELECT ifnull(sum(mny_count), 0) + ifnull(sum(jx_count), 0) + ifnull(sum(black_count), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
AND `type` = 15

SELECT ifnull(sum(farrow_weight), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
AND `type` = 15

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
AND `type` = 16

SELECT ifnull(sum(health_count), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
AND `type` = 16

SELECT ifnull(sum(wean_count), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
AND `type` = 16

SELECT ifnull(sum(wean_count * feed_days) , 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
AND `type` = 16

select ifnull(sum(wean_count*wean_avg_weight),0) FROM doctor_pig_events
AND `type` = 16

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
AND `type` IN (7, 20) AND boar_type = 1 AND kind = 2

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
AND `type` = 20 AND boar_type = 1 AND kind = 2

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
and type = 6 and change_type_id = 110 and kind = 2 and boar_type = 1

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
and type = 6 and change_type_id = 111 and kind = 2 and boar_type = 1

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
and type = 6 and change_type_id = 109 and kind = 2 and boar_type = 1

SELECT ifnull(count(1), 0) FROM doctor_pig_events
and kind = 2 and boar_type = 1 and (`type` = 2 OR ( `type`= 6 and change_type_id not in (109,110,111)))

select count(1) as quantity from doctor_pigs a where a.pig_type = 1 and a.farm_id = #{farmId} and (a.in_farm_date <= #{sumAt} and (a.is_removal = 0 or (a.is_removal = 1 and (exists(select 1 from doctor_pig_events c where c.pig_id = a.id and (c.type = 2 or c.type = 6) and c.event_at > #{sumAt}))))) and (not exists(select 1 from doctor_pig_events d where d.pig_id = a.id and d.type = 9 and d.event_at <= #{sumAt}))

select count(*) from doctor_pig_events a left join doctor_pig_events b on a.pig_id = b.pig_id where a.farm_id = #{farmId} and a.event_at >= #{startAt} and a.event_at <= #{endAt} and a.event_source != 5 and a.status = 1 and a.type = 9 and a.current_mating_count = 1 and b.type = 15 and a.parity = b.parity and b.event_source != 5 and b.status = 1 and a.id = b.rel_event_id

select farm_id as farmId, min(event_at) as eventAt FROM ( select a.farm_id as farm_id, a.event_at as event_at from doctor_pig_events a left join doctor_pig_events b on a.pig_id = b.pig_id where a.event_source != 5 and a.status = 1 and b.event_source != 5 and b.status = 1 and b.type = 15 and a.id = b.rel_event_id AND b.updated_at >= #{startAt} UNION ALL SELECT farm_id, event_at FROM doctor_pig_events WHERE type = 9 and current_mating_count = 1 and updated_at >= #{startAt} and status = 1 and event_source != 5 ) a group by farm_id
